Set up and use templates and reusable text blocks within the {{< var validmind.platform >}} to standardize and streamline documentation and reporting for your organization.

## Manage documentation templates

Use {{< var vm.product >}}'s versioned documentation templates to ensure consistent and comprehensive model documentation, validation reports, and ongoing monitoring reports across all your models. You customize these templates to fit your specific case-by-case needs, such as type or complexity of model or model use case.

:::{#documentation-templates}
:::

## Manage text block library

Maintain a library of reusable text blocks within the {{< var validmind.platform >}} to ensure consistent and comprehensive content within your model documentation, validation reports, and ongoing monitoring reports across all your models.

:::{#text-blocks}
:::
